mapper.insert:
insert into base_waterjet_template
template_length, template_width, template_name, template_file_id, template_pic_id, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark,
#{templateLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templatePicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select count(bwt.id) from base_waterjet_template bwt where 1 = 1
and bwt.is_deleted = 0
